await billing.balances("0xc1D0Ea90A55Bca742FEBdF34BE3F367259F79fc1")

  .fund({ value: ethers.parseEther("0.001") })
await billing.connect(await ethers.getSigner("0xc1D0Ea90A55Bca742FEBdF34BE3F367259F79fc1"))
await billing.pricePerTokenWei(ethers.id("llm-secure-7b")) // should be 1e9
await billing.balances("0xc1D0Ea90A55Bca742FEBdF34BE3F367259F79fc1") // must be >= costWei
await billing.setVerifier(await verifier.getAddress())
await verifier.waitForDeployment()
const verifier = await Verifier.deploy()
